meta.description: CSH for table cleaner static Labels

languageKey.label: Tables
Select the tables from which you want to remove the deleted entries.
Retention time
Choose the number of days after which the 'deleted' entries should be removed from the chosen tables.
Tables
Select the tables from which you want to remove the hidden entries.
Retention time
Choose the number of days after which the 'hidden' entries should be removed from the chosen tables.
Tables
Select the tables from which you want to remove the expired entries.
Retention time
Choose the number of days after which the entries should be removed from the chosen tables.
